mdBlocks.parent: Fletのアプリをより「**アプリっぽく**」することができるコントロール、**AppBar**についてご紹介します。
AppBarを使用すると、こんな感じの**画面の上部分に固定されたUI**をつくることができます。

![1000000556.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/8f1dbbd6-79d1-4068-aec7-474ac321d2e7/1000000556.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466T54RHO54%2F20250216%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250216T151659Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEDQaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCP93aNH7%2FXt219HdrQuHZaeBTRThcI860xCEQY6QdfCwIgXOh0E%2BWhGCOfDlDG8GSnNWte5zqHnD%2BeQNuox%2BuqHtoq%2FwMIXRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDEcHYtZYo4gQ1JHllCrcA5bC8Ya92fJua13H12NKvWxSaKznt7l4ingwQCJtS%2FHcD9bxj1mi44WP61XUPNlHUvLzzdiIdh0jvAcDUPWQmPjt0K72el1%2BCvp4PXKUCiGvZxaQ0UIWHCY4oPikj3vo0%2B0sWDgfadOZjAZeKXIXaq6%2F06edsYpC1L5pJm0sibXIustcZHLCYCXmUFSIKLuSDEw%2BxGVM3YenAszwldIJ7RLkRWE%2BBeRK2Lik94pW4fauSInXFPzDENFZQgTs%2FimJtBNjyVD%2F7zdEnSK2LS2xLE%2FKKgx5P3UXZxWAWoa1aPbIlkqpR0dqnjFitrmbS1jV1wwi6MII6iujFpN%2Bx9qgmmA55saTjc0q4vXMGjRBqkp2goHTHE0HrWmCEPzKwgcyoJPYJXPWZR1zu%2BDmYU5GGd1hEwap%2FO7oRhMJjmucmsrdjzj4%2B6MjDwORhwz3W%2BBkV2fCJu11kRlRtm6mOohWIy5JdYJLFVY3DDMC%2FJUMNm%2BGWQXEA6vqCUOn6Z0QaiaZHkS72t2ffcMg3ylWgaRITBEvsJ1qJlfVsMWy%2Fsa%2FAptlDWC6m%2FCzDDuqCbtmBeqXyFgnyv%2FAS9Sy%2BMy%2FHbr0JulQHXPpPiEMUMWhjKnejkqKmo2S2LaPNy%2BBbaQXMPChx70GOqUBgHdD93zeeYHIXVENUhrv02N%2BYe9Sc0e%2FUDrqBD7GSwSr8PCZQq%2BLBiBfSIWt1%2FLyW8apx7t3FDLi41plI8X4GBDIjP8FBCVkF9EKhJeQsWNJMPHMFlkkwYvCNBFhNcH84mcTbjnfu6Ja0G%2FHUWxKihFU1%2B5XfFyeQsr%2FHhcooanSnUkawAL4mTraraB0On%2BnZw6kofvjbgtcbKLCjX0HSN4%2BD%2BZY&X-Amz-Signature=41db8c331942bea2071c522535f8a68d07f6ce1bb46c82b58c9c343073cc276f&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
インスタグラムのアプリで言う、この部分です。
Fletで実装すると、以下のような見た目になります。
![From : https://flet.dev/docs/controls/appbar/](https://flet.dev/img/docs/controls/app-bar/app-bar.gif)
AppBarは、パソコンアプリはもちろん、スマホアプリを作るときに役立ちます。
# AppBarの実装方法
AppBarの実装方法は、これまで使用していたコントロールと少し違います。
これまで使用していたコントロールは、任意の変数に代入した後、`page.add`で画面に追加していました。

```python
# これまでのコントロール
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# 任意の変数にコントロールを代入
		text = ft.Text(value="サンプル")

		# page.addする
    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
対する**AppBar**は、すでに名前が決まっている変数**`page.appbar`**に代入することで実装することができます。
> ✏️ `page.appbar`は`page`の<u>メンバ変数</u>ですね。
また、この`page.appbar`は`page.add`する必要はありません。
以下のコードを見てみてください⇩

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# page.appbarにft.Appbarを代入
    **page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.APPLE),
        title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.MENU)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.GREEN
    )**

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
このコードを実行すると、以下のような結果になります。

![d7a1dbdf-822b-4608-a345-057581180b6f.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/854aa77d-e999-4ca8-b277-5ca4e90b78f6/d7a1dbdf-822b-4608-a345-057581180b6f.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466T54RHO54%2F20250216%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250216T151659Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEDQaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCP93aNH7%2FXt219HdrQuHZaeBTRThcI860xCEQY6QdfCwIgXOh0E%2BWhGCOfDlDG8GSnNWte5zqHnD%2BeQNuox%2BuqHtoq%2FwMIXRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDEcHYtZYo4gQ1JHllCrcA5bC8Ya92fJua13H12NKvWxSaKznt7l4ingwQCJtS%2FHcD9bxj1mi44WP61XUPNlHUvLzzdiIdh0jvAcDUPWQmPjt0K72el1%2BCvp4PXKUCiGvZxaQ0UIWHCY4oPikj3vo0%2B0sWDgfadOZjAZeKXIXaq6%2F06edsYpC1L5pJm0sibXIustcZHLCYCXmUFSIKLuSDEw%2BxGVM3YenAszwldIJ7RLkRWE%2BBeRK2Lik94pW4fauSInXFPzDENFZQgTs%2FimJtBNjyVD%2F7zdEnSK2LS2xLE%2FKKgx5P3UXZxWAWoa1aPbIlkqpR0dqnjFitrmbS1jV1wwi6MII6iujFpN%2Bx9qgmmA55saTjc0q4vXMGjRBqkp2goHTHE0HrWmCEPzKwgcyoJPYJXPWZR1zu%2BDmYU5GGd1hEwap%2FO7oRhMJjmucmsrdjzj4%2B6MjDwORhwz3W%2BBkV2fCJu11kRlRtm6mOohWIy5JdYJLFVY3DDMC%2FJUMNm%2BGWQXEA6vqCUOn6Z0QaiaZHkS72t2ffcMg3ylWgaRITBEvsJ1qJlfVsMWy%2Fsa%2FAptlDWC6m%2FCzDDuqCbtmBeqXyFgnyv%2FAS9Sy%2BMy%2FHbr0JulQHXPpPiEMUMWhjKnejkqKmo2S2LaPNy%2BBbaQXMPChx70GOqUBgHdD93zeeYHIXVENUhrv02N%2BYe9Sc0e%2FUDrqBD7GSwSr8PCZQq%2BLBiBfSIWt1%2FLyW8apx7t3FDLi41plI8X4GBDIjP8FBCVkF9EKhJeQsWNJMPHMFlkkwYvCNBFhNcH84mcTbjnfu6Ja0G%2FHUWxKihFU1%2B5XfFyeQsr%2FHhcooanSnUkawAL4mTraraB0On%2BnZw6kofvjbgtcbKLCjX0HSN4%2BD%2BZY&X-Amz-Signature=044edf52c04b1ebfb01504dd44d257ce796fbe19b4f3c0ffd8b95a093bbe3204&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
各部を設定するプロパティを示すと以下のようになります。

![ffb68a49-9792-4781-9d24-55d00d719022.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/cac638af-7f1b-4896-8e31-a5fa903a7f37/ffb68a49-9792-4781-9d24-55d00d719022.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466T54RHO54%2F20250216%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250216T151659Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEDQaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCP93aNH7%2FXt219HdrQuHZaeBTRThcI860xCEQY6QdfCwIgXOh0E%2BWhGCOfDlDG8GSnNWte5zqHnD%2BeQNuox%2BuqHtoq%2FwMIXRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDEcHYtZYo4gQ1JHllCrcA5bC8Ya92fJua13H12NKvWxSaKznt7l4ingwQCJtS%2FHcD9bxj1mi44WP61XUPNlHUvLzzdiIdh0jvAcDUPWQmPjt0K72el1%2BCvp4PXKUCiGvZxaQ0UIWHCY4oPikj3vo0%2B0sWDgfadOZjAZeKXIXaq6%2F06edsYpC1L5pJm0sibXIustcZHLCYCXmUFSIKLuSDEw%2BxGVM3YenAszwldIJ7RLkRWE%2BBeRK2Lik94pW4fauSInXFPzDENFZQgTs%2FimJtBNjyVD%2F7zdEnSK2LS2xLE%2FKKgx5P3UXZxWAWoa1aPbIlkqpR0dqnjFitrmbS1jV1wwi6MII6iujFpN%2Bx9qgmmA55saTjc0q4vXMGjRBqkp2goHTHE0HrWmCEPzKwgcyoJPYJXPWZR1zu%2BDmYU5GGd1hEwap%2FO7oRhMJjmucmsrdjzj4%2B6MjDwORhwz3W%2BBkV2fCJu11kRlRtm6mOohWIy5JdYJLFVY3DDMC%2FJUMNm%2BGWQXEA6vqCUOn6Z0QaiaZHkS72t2ffcMg3ylWgaRITBEvsJ1qJlfVsMWy%2Fsa%2FAptlDWC6m%2FCzDDuqCbtmBeqXyFgnyv%2FAS9Sy%2BMy%2FHbr0JulQHXPpPiEMUMWhjKnejkqKmo2S2LaPNy%2BBbaQXMPChx70GOqUBgHdD93zeeYHIXVENUhrv02N%2BYe9Sc0e%2FUDrqBD7GSwSr8PCZQq%2BLBiBfSIWt1%2FLyW8apx7t3FDLi41plI8X4GBDIjP8FBCVkF9EKhJeQsWNJMPHMFlkkwYvCNBFhNcH84mcTbjnfu6Ja0G%2FHUWxKihFU1%2B5XfFyeQsr%2FHhcooanSnUkawAL4mTraraB0On%2BnZw6kofvjbgtcbKLCjX0HSN4%2BD%2BZY&X-Amz-Signature=ffb8b99c228e8a66415ba1d0c48dd41c6dd5ff3e65b7607c02a6d2a3971daf0b&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
# AppBarの役割
AppBarには、主に3つの役割があります。一つづつ順番に紹介していきますね。
## タイトルの表示
### `title`プロパティ
AppBarの`title`プロパティに`ft.Text`コントロールを渡すと、AppBarに好きな文字列を表示させることができます。
アプリの名前などを表示すると良いでしょう。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        **title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLACK12
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![0b9a27b4-6b11-463b-a93a-852bbbf668b8.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/ae95db3a-37fc-486e-9e70-675a32b6cb3b/0b9a27b4-6b11-463b-a93a-852bbbf668b8.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466T54RHO54%2F20250216%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250216T151659Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEDQaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCP93aNH7%2FXt219HdrQuHZaeBTRThcI860xCEQY6QdfCwIgXOh0E%2BWhGCOfDlDG8GSnNWte5zqHnD%2BeQNuox%2BuqHtoq%2FwMIXRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDEcHYtZYo4gQ1JHllCrcA5bC8Ya92fJua13H12NKvWxSaKznt7l4ingwQCJtS%2FHcD9bxj1mi44WP61XUPNlHUvLzzdiIdh0jvAcDUPWQmPjt0K72el1%2BCvp4PXKUCiGvZxaQ0UIWHCY4oPikj3vo0%2B0sWDgfadOZjAZeKXIXaq6%2F06edsYpC1L5pJm0sibXIustcZHLCYCXmUFSIKLuSDEw%2BxGVM3YenAszwldIJ7RLkRWE%2BBeRK2Lik94pW4fauSInXFPzDENFZQgTs%2FimJtBNjyVD%2F7zdEnSK2LS2xLE%2FKKgx5P3UXZxWAWoa1aPbIlkqpR0dqnjFitrmbS1jV1wwi6MII6iujFpN%2Bx9qgmmA55saTjc0q4vXMGjRBqkp2goHTHE0HrWmCEPzKwgcyoJPYJXPWZR1zu%2BDmYU5GGd1hEwap%2FO7oRhMJjmucmsrdjzj4%2B6MjDwORhwz3W%2BBkV2fCJu11kRlRtm6mOohWIy5JdYJLFVY3DDMC%2FJUMNm%2BGWQXEA6vqCUOn6Z0QaiaZHkS72t2ffcMg3ylWgaRITBEvsJ1qJlfVsMWy%2Fsa%2FAptlDWC6m%2FCzDDuqCbtmBeqXyFgnyv%2FAS9Sy%2BMy%2FHbr0JulQHXPpPiEMUMWhjKnejkqKmo2S2LaPNy%2BBbaQXMPChx70GOqUBgHdD93zeeYHIXVENUhrv02N%2BYe9Sc0e%2FUDrqBD7GSwSr8PCZQq%2BLBiBfSIWt1%2FLyW8apx7t3FDLi41plI8X4GBDIjP8FBCVkF9EKhJeQsWNJMPHMFlkkwYvCNBFhNcH84mcTbjnfu6Ja0G%2FHUWxKihFU1%2B5XfFyeQsr%2FHhcooanSnUkawAL4mTraraB0On%2BnZw6kofvjbgtcbKLCjX0HSN4%2BD%2BZY&X-Amz-Signature=5e7dbd16d3d7bf59fb050c67927c81cce62ca7e2abeabbb0383aa3298987d6f5&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
`title`プロパティに渡すのは`ft.Text`コントロールなので、サイズやフォント、色を好きにカスタマイズできます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.fonts = {
        "Jacquarda" : "/fonts/JacquardaBastarda9-Regular.ttf"
    }

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=**ft.Text(
            value="Applicarion Name",
            color=ft.colors.CYAN,
            size=35,
            font_family="Jacquarda"
        )**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![61b18d9c-cdd2-4459-8d1a-22e3ff246abd.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/e1bf9678-b68a-40b8-93d7-0b2a093f5e5b/61b18d9c-cdd2-4459-8d1a-22e3ff246abd.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466T54RHO54%2F20250216%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250216T151700Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEDQaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCP93aNH7%2FXt219HdrQuHZaeBTRThcI860xCEQY6QdfCwIgXOh0E%2BWhGCOfDlDG8GSnNWte5zqHnD%2BeQNuox%2BuqHtoq%2FwMIXRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDEcHYtZYo4gQ1JHllCrcA5bC8Ya92fJua13H12NKvWxSaKznt7l4ingwQCJtS%2FHcD9bxj1mi44WP61XUPNlHUvLzzdiIdh0jvAcDUPWQmPjt0K72el1%2BCvp4PXKUCiGvZxaQ0UIWHCY4oPikj3vo0%2B0sWDgfadOZjAZeKXIXaq6%2F06edsYpC1L5pJm0sibXIustcZHLCYCXmUFSIKLuSDEw%2BxGVM3YenAszwldIJ7RLkRWE%2BBeRK2Lik94pW4fauSInXFPzDENFZQgTs%2FimJtBNjyVD%2F7zdEnSK2LS2xLE%2FKKgx5P3UXZxWAWoa1aPbIlkqpR0dqnjFitrmbS1jV1wwi6MII6iujFpN%2Bx9qgmmA55saTjc0q4vXMGjRBqkp2goHTHE0HrWmCEPzKwgcyoJPYJXPWZR1zu%2BDmYU5GGd1hEwap%2FO7oRhMJjmucmsrdjzj4%2B6MjDwORhwz3W%2BBkV2fCJu11kRlRtm6mOohWIy5JdYJLFVY3DDMC%2FJUMNm%2BGWQXEA6vqCUOn6Z0QaiaZHkS72t2ffcMg3ylWgaRITBEvsJ1qJlfVsMWy%2Fsa%2FAptlDWC6m%2FCzDDuqCbtmBeqXyFgnyv%2FAS9Sy%2BMy%2FHbr0JulQHXPpPiEMUMWhjKnejkqKmo2S2LaPNy%2BBbaQXMPChx70GOqUBgHdD93zeeYHIXVENUhrv02N%2BYe9Sc0e%2FUDrqBD7GSwSr8PCZQq%2BLBiBfSIWt1%2FLyW8apx7t3FDLi41plI8X4GBDIjP8FBCVkF9EKhJeQsWNJMPHMFlkkwYvCNBFhNcH84mcTbjnfu6Ja0G%2FHUWxKihFU1%2B5XfFyeQsr%2FHhcooanSnUkawAL4mTraraB0On%2BnZw6kofvjbgtcbKLCjX0HSN4%2BD%2BZY&X-Amz-Signature=328616df44af4dc76a72b11a14ab784575f916e24838a5b36ca91409c6a3ecc4&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
`ft.Text`コントロールの詳しい使用方法は、以下を参照してください。
[bookmark](https://flet.dev/docs/controls/text/)
### タイトルの中央寄せ
先ほどの例ではタイトルが左寄りになっていましたが、以下のように中央に寄せることもできます。

![center_title.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/e56d3a00-57e2-4016-9f36-425965a667e3/center_title.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466T54RHO54%2F20250216%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250216T151700Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEDQaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCP93aNH7%2FXt219HdrQuHZaeBTRThcI860xCEQY6QdfCwIgXOh0E%2BWhGCOfDlDG8GSnNWte5zqHnD%2BeQNuox%2BuqHtoq%2FwMIXRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDEcHYtZYo4gQ1JHllCrcA5bC8Ya92fJua13H12NKvWxSaKznt7l4ingwQCJtS%2FHcD9bxj1mi44WP61XUPNlHUvLzzdiIdh0jvAcDUPWQmPjt0K72el1%2BCvp4PXKUCiGvZxaQ0UIWHCY4oPikj3vo0%2B0sWDgfadOZjAZeKXIXaq6%2F06edsYpC1L5pJm0sibXIustcZHLCYCXmUFSIKLuSDEw%2BxGVM3YenAszwldIJ7RLkRWE%2BBeRK2Lik94pW4fauSInXFPzDENFZQgTs%2FimJtBNjyVD%2F7zdEnSK2LS2xLE%2FKKgx5P3UXZxWAWoa1aPbIlkqpR0dqnjFitrmbS1jV1wwi6MII6iujFpN%2Bx9qgmmA55saTjc0q4vXMGjRBqkp2goHTHE0HrWmCEPzKwgcyoJPYJXPWZR1zu%2BDmYU5GGd1hEwap%2FO7oRhMJjmucmsrdjzj4%2B6MjDwORhwz3W%2BBkV2fCJu11kRlRtm6mOohWIy5JdYJLFVY3DDMC%2FJUMNm%2BGWQXEA6vqCUOn6Z0QaiaZHkS72t2ffcMg3ylWgaRITBEvsJ1qJlfVsMWy%2Fsa%2FAptlDWC6m%2FCzDDuqCbtmBeqXyFgnyv%2FAS9Sy%2BMy%2FHbr0JulQHXPpPiEMUMWhjKnejkqKmo2S2LaPNy%2BBbaQXMPChx70GOqUBgHdD93zeeYHIXVENUhrv02N%2BYe9Sc0e%2FUDrqBD7GSwSr8PCZQq%2BLBiBfSIWt1%2FLyW8apx7t3FDLi41plI8X4GBDIjP8FBCVkF9EKhJeQsWNJMPHMFlkkwYvCNBFhNcH84mcTbjnfu6Ja0G%2FHUWxKihFU1%2B5XfFyeQsr%2FHhcooanSnUkawAL4mTraraB0On%2BnZw6kofvjbgtcbKLCjX0HSN4%2BD%2BZY&X-Amz-Signature=1f1b997542276bf00d1b7e86ba18aa0d166b3f156b5ba7357a940561aa7c286d&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
タイトルを中央に寄せるためには、`center_title`プロパティを`True`を設定します。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Applicarion Name"),
        # タイトルを中央寄せ
        **center_title=True**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
## アイコンの表示
### `leading`プロパティ
このAppBarの左側には、そのアプリを象徴するアイコンを配置することができます。

![9b338a43-a54c-433a-adc8-7e3f6374712e.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/5b4e50fa-d3ad-4575-a089-a21e900514b3/9b338a43-a54c-433a-adc8-7e3f6374712e.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466T54RHO54%2F20250216%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250216T151659Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEDQaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCP93aNH7%2FXt219HdrQuHZaeBTRThcI860xCEQY6QdfCwIgXOh0E%2BWhGCOfDlDG8GSnNWte5zqHnD%2BeQNuox%2BuqHtoq%2FwMIXRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDEcHYtZYo4gQ1JHllCrcA5bC8Ya92fJua13H12NKvWxSaKznt7l4ingwQCJtS%2FHcD9bxj1mi44WP61XUPNlHUvLzzdiIdh0jvAcDUPWQmPjt0K72el1%2BCvp4PXKUCiGvZxaQ0UIWHCY4oPikj3vo0%2B0sWDgfadOZjAZeKXIXaq6%2F06edsYpC1L5pJm0sibXIustcZHLCYCXmUFSIKLuSDEw%2BxGVM3YenAszwldIJ7RLkRWE%2BBeRK2Lik94pW4fauSInXFPzDENFZQgTs%2FimJtBNjyVD%2F7zdEnSK2LS2xLE%2FKKgx5P3UXZxWAWoa1aPbIlkqpR0dqnjFitrmbS1jV1wwi6MII6iujFpN%2Bx9qgmmA55saTjc0q4vXMGjRBqkp2goHTHE0HrWmCEPzKwgcyoJPYJXPWZR1zu%2BDmYU5GGd1hEwap%2FO7oRhMJjmucmsrdjzj4%2B6MjDwORhwz3W%2BBkV2fCJu11kRlRtm6mOohWIy5JdYJLFVY3DDMC%2FJUMNm%2BGWQXEA6vqCUOn6Z0QaiaZHkS72t2ffcMg3ylWgaRITBEvsJ1qJlfVsMWy%2Fsa%2FAptlDWC6m%2FCzDDuqCbtmBeqXyFgnyv%2FAS9Sy%2BMy%2FHbr0JulQHXPpPiEMUMWhjKnejkqKmo2S2LaPNy%2BBbaQXMPChx70GOqUBgHdD93zeeYHIXVENUhrv02N%2BYe9Sc0e%2FUDrqBD7GSwSr8PCZQq%2BLBiBfSIWt1%2FLyW8apx7t3FDLi41plI8X4GBDIjP8FBCVkF9EKhJeQsWNJMPHMFlkkwYvCNBFhNcH84mcTbjnfu6Ja0G%2FHUWxKihFU1%2B5XfFyeQsr%2FHhcooanSnUkawAL4mTraraB0On%2BnZw6kofvjbgtcbKLCjX0HSN4%2BD%2BZY&X-Amz-Signature=2fb9a49d4c6fbf2164cf48c33f34e337a74c82680f0eca2f35f126ea3d46918c&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
この`leading`プロパティには、`ft.Icon`コントロールを設定することができます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
		    # 左端に配置するアイコン
        **leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.TIPS_AND_UPDATES),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
この`ft.Icon`コントロールで使用できるアイコンは、以下の[アイコンブラウザー](https://gallery.flet.dev/icons-browser/)で調べる事ができます。
[bookmark](https://gallery.flet.dev/icons-browser/)

> ☝ ちなみに…  
> 実は、`leading`に設定できるのは**アイコンだけではありません**。  
>   
> `leading`には様々なコントロール（おそらくほぼすべて）を設定でき、例えば画像やテキスト、任意のボタンを設置することもできます。  
>   
> コード例と実行例

children.parent: 実は、`leading`に設定できるのは**アイコンだけではありません**。
`leading`には様々なコントロール（おそらくほぼすべて）を設定でき、例えば画像やテキスト、任意のボタンを設置することもできます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Horizon"),
        leading=ft.Container(
            content=ft.Image(
                src="/horizon_icon.png",
            ),
            padding=10
        ),
        toolbar_height=70,
        leading_width=70,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

mdBlocks.parent: ## 固定ボタンの設置
### `actions`プロパティ
AppBarの右側には、複数のボタンを設置することができます。インスタのAppBarでいうDMボタンですね。

![%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%81%AEAppBar.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/ba5956d1-8349-4a15-bf28-3820bc6a1bdc/%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%81%AEAppBar.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466T54RHO54%2F20250216%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250216T151700Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEDQaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCP93aNH7%2FXt219HdrQuHZaeBTRThcI860xCEQY6QdfCwIgXOh0E%2BWhGCOfDlDG8GSnNWte5zqHnD%2BeQNuox%2BuqHtoq%2FwMIXRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDEcHYtZYo4gQ1JHllCrcA5bC8Ya92fJua13H12NKvWxSaKznt7l4ingwQCJtS%2FHcD9bxj1mi44WP61XUPNlHUvLzzdiIdh0jvAcDUPWQmPjt0K72el1%2BCvp4PXKUCiGvZxaQ0UIWHCY4oPikj3vo0%2B0sWDgfadOZjAZeKXIXaq6%2F06edsYpC1L5pJm0sibXIustcZHLCYCXmUFSIKLuSDEw%2BxGVM3YenAszwldIJ7RLkRWE%2BBeRK2Lik94pW4fauSInXFPzDENFZQgTs%2FimJtBNjyVD%2F7zdEnSK2LS2xLE%2FKKgx5P3UXZxWAWoa1aPbIlkqpR0dqnjFitrmbS1jV1wwi6MII6iujFpN%2Bx9qgmmA55saTjc0q4vXMGjRBqkp2goHTHE0HrWmCEPzKwgcyoJPYJXPWZR1zu%2BDmYU5GGd1hEwap%2FO7oRhMJjmucmsrdjzj4%2B6MjDwORhwz3W%2BBkV2fCJu11kRlRtm6mOohWIy5JdYJLFVY3DDMC%2FJUMNm%2BGWQXEA6vqCUOn6Z0QaiaZHkS72t2ffcMg3ylWgaRITBEvsJ1qJlfVsMWy%2Fsa%2FAptlDWC6m%2FCzDDuqCbtmBeqXyFgnyv%2FAS9Sy%2BMy%2FHbr0JulQHXPpPiEMUMWhjKnejkqKmo2S2LaPNy%2BBbaQXMPChx70GOqUBgHdD93zeeYHIXVENUhrv02N%2BYe9Sc0e%2FUDrqBD7GSwSr8PCZQq%2BLBiBfSIWt1%2FLyW8apx7t3FDLi41plI8X4GBDIjP8FBCVkF9EKhJeQsWNJMPHMFlkkwYvCNBFhNcH84mcTbjnfu6Ja0G%2FHUWxKihFU1%2B5XfFyeQsr%2FHhcooanSnUkawAL4mTraraB0On%2BnZw6kofvjbgtcbKLCjX0HSN4%2BD%2BZY&X-Amz-Signature=a03d271c5d23425fe4e5a6f9c632864375734d4e3ae3c0e2094f90ed719ade5f&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
一般的には`ft.IconButton`コントロールを設置します。
このボタンは、**`antions`**プロパティにリスト形式で複数の`ft.IconButtons`を与えることで設定します。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.MESSAGE),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.CALENDAR_MONTH),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.SETTINGS)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarの固定ボタンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![actions.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/81f429aa-2cb8-48ec-b7a7-78fff8764818/actions.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466T54RHO54%2F20250216%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250216T151700Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEDQaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCP93aNH7%2FXt219HdrQuHZaeBTRThcI860xCEQY6QdfCwIgXOh0E%2BWhGCOfDlDG8GSnNWte5zqHnD%2BeQNuox%2BuqHtoq%2FwMIXRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDEcHYtZYo4gQ1JHllCrcA5bC8Ya92fJua13H12NKvWxSaKznt7l4ingwQCJtS%2FHcD9bxj1mi44WP61XUPNlHUvLzzdiIdh0jvAcDUPWQmPjt0K72el1%2BCvp4PXKUCiGvZxaQ0UIWHCY4oPikj3vo0%2B0sWDgfadOZjAZeKXIXaq6%2F06edsYpC1L5pJm0sibXIustcZHLCYCXmUFSIKLuSDEw%2BxGVM3YenAszwldIJ7RLkRWE%2BBeRK2Lik94pW4fauSInXFPzDENFZQgTs%2FimJtBNjyVD%2F7zdEnSK2LS2xLE%2FKKgx5P3UXZxWAWoa1aPbIlkqpR0dqnjFitrmbS1jV1wwi6MII6iujFpN%2Bx9qgmmA55saTjc0q4vXMGjRBqkp2goHTHE0HrWmCEPzKwgcyoJPYJXPWZR1zu%2BDmYU5GGd1hEwap%2FO7oRhMJjmucmsrdjzj4%2B6MjDwORhwz3W%2BBkV2fCJu11kRlRtm6mOohWIy5JdYJLFVY3DDMC%2FJUMNm%2BGWQXEA6vqCUOn6Z0QaiaZHkS72t2ffcMg3ylWgaRITBEvsJ1qJlfVsMWy%2Fsa%2FAptlDWC6m%2FCzDDuqCbtmBeqXyFgnyv%2FAS9Sy%2BMy%2FHbr0JulQHXPpPiEMUMWhjKnejkqKmo2S2LaPNy%2BBbaQXMPChx70GOqUBgHdD93zeeYHIXVENUhrv02N%2BYe9Sc0e%2FUDrqBD7GSwSr8PCZQq%2BLBiBfSIWt1%2FLyW8apx7t3FDLi41plI8X4GBDIjP8FBCVkF9EKhJeQsWNJMPHMFlkkwYvCNBFhNcH84mcTbjnfu6Ja0G%2FHUWxKihFU1%2B5XfFyeQsr%2FHhcooanSnUkawAL4mTraraB0On%2BnZw6kofvjbgtcbKLCjX0HSN4%2BD%2BZY&X-Amz-Signature=f2fb0a53a1fe536e5635b8cb1f3058fe25a06b352022cf6575e0d79add6a4a5f&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
専用の関数を作成し、ボタンにイベントハンドラを設定することで、特定の処理を呼び出したり他の画面に遷移することができるようになります。
